TextLibrary.Text: Darkhunter
I need to go to Maethelburg.
I need to go to Maethelburg.
I need to go to Maethelburg.
I need to go to Maethelburg.
Maethelburg? Why?
Maethelburg? Why?
Maethelburg? Why?
Maethelburg? Why?
That is my business! Why must you always ask so many questions?
That is my business! Why must you always ask so many questions?
That is my business! Why must you always ask so many questions?
That is my business! Why must you always ask so many questions?
Let's just say I'm curious why you want to travel weeks out of our way, to a place you are not allowed to go...
Let's just say I'm curious why you want to travel weeks out of our way, to a place you are not allowed to go...
Let's just say I'm curious why you want to travel weeks out of our way, to a place you are not allowed to go...
Let's just say I'm curious why you want to travel weeks out of our way, to a place you are not allowed to go...
Fine. I wish to talk with Lord Greythane. I require his advice on a matter of personal importance.
Fine. I wish to talk with Lord Greythane. I require his advice on a matter of personal importance.
Fine. I wish to talk with Lord Greythane. I require his advice on a matter of personal importance.
Fine. I wish to talk with Lord Greythane. I require his advice on a matter of personal importance.
Advice from Greythane? Well, I'm intrigued enough to join you... even if you won't tell me what this is all about.
Advice from Greythane? Well, I'm intrigued enough to join you... even if you won't tell me what this is all about.
Advice from Greythane? Well, I'm intrigued enough to join you... even if you won't tell me what this is all about.
Advice from Greythane? Well, I'm intrigued enough to join you... even if you won't tell me what this is all about.
Thank you for trusting me.
Thank you for trusting me.
Thank you for trusting me.
Thank you for trusting me.
